courseName: Master of Science in Electronic Engineering
universityName: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
facultyName: School of Engineering - Taught Postgraduate Programs
description: At a fundamental level, the increasing speed at which we can acquire, interpret, and take action based on information impacts on many of the changes we are observing in the modern world. Much of this increased speed is due to advances in Electronic Engineering.
fees: Fees2024/25 Fall intake - Full-time students: HK$192,500 (~US$24,700) - paid in 2 installments - Part-time students: HK$168,300 (~US$21,600) - paid in 4 installments  For other fees, please visit the university website.
